desc: For over 40 years Ventsam Sash & Doors has manufactured custom windows and doors. We also carry a large selection of windows, doors and hardware from many of the top brands in the industry. For the first time ever, you can now shop our quality windows, doors and hardware online and have them shipped right to you.

layout.text: OUR SUCCESS IS BASED UPON BUILDING LONG-LASTING RELATIONSHIPS WITH OUR CUSTOMERS
we are always ready to provide high-quality products and high level of service during the order process and throughout the use of our products
